summary: Have you seen Camping and is it any good? I read a review saying it’s crap but I love David and now I can’t decide if I want to...
question: Have you seen Camping and is it any good? I read a review saying it’s crap but I love David and now I can’t decide if I want to watch it!
answer:
Hello @storamogul!

Thanks to the lovely people on DT Asylum, I have been able to see Camping before it is officially available here via the BBC. 

The UK series “Camping” it is based on (written by Julia Davis) did not manage to draw me in at all, so I was apprehensive about watching the HBO version. The first episode did not interest me very much. In fact, I wondered why I was bothering, but I persisted. 

I’m now glad that I did. Although I don’t love Camping desperately (I am NOT a fan of camping at the best of times and would rather spend the extra money to stay in a hotel, so that was a major point against it) I have gradually learned to like certain aspects of it, and don’t dislike particular characters with my initial vengeance. 

Except for Kathryn (Jennifer Gardner’s character) - I can completely sympathise with her gynaecological problems but I would still cross the road to avoid meeting her. Whereas Walt, her husband played by DT, has all my sympathy! As a DT fan, I’d say it’s worth it just to gain that need to hug the stuffing out of him; and his sister-in-law. 

Although it doesn’t help that every time he calls his wife by her full name: “Kathryn“, I hear “Catherine” and long for Catherine Tate to be there instead, because I don’t find  Kathryn funny at all. Well, not funny ha ha, but funny peculiar. 

But generally speaking, I found “There She Goes” a much better watch (even though I wanted to hit the earlier (aka arsehole) version of Simon with a cricket bat).

tags: can you believe this is part 21?
all behind-the-scenes of the christmas invasion?
this is my favorite episode to make behind the scenes posts about
because david was a brand-new baby doctor
and there's lots of pictures and interviews
and I remember how exciting it all was
summary: Behind the Scenes of The Christmas Invasion (Part 21)  Excerpts from Doctor Who: The Inside Story:  For the show’s new star,...
caption:
Behind the Scenes of The Christmas Invasion (Part 21)

Excerpts from Doctor Who: The Inside Story:

For the show’s new star, reading the script for the first time was a slightly peculiar experience. “By page forty, I still hadn’t done very much,” David points out. “I thought that was bold, keeping the main character in a coma for most of it. Then he wakes up and you have five pages of sparkling Russell T Davies dialogue, and it works brilliantly. Obviously, it’s daunting because when you wake up you have to justify the fact that you’ve been kept off-screen all this time by making an impact. So from an acting point of view that was the challenge. But it’s a great script; it’s got some fantastic gags in it; a wonderful kind of heroic swagger; and it has a slightly off-the-wall, mercurial anarchy, which I think is what defines what’s extraordinary about the Doctor. I don’t do very much, then I wake up. I talk for five pages; I press the button that nobody’s allowed to press; I break the monster’s staff; I haul away his whip. And then, just to top it all off, I have a sword fight with him on the wing of a spaceship - my hand is cut off; I grow it back, and then bring down the Prime Minister of Great Britain - all within ten minutes. You can’t really ask for a better entrance than that.”

Other parts of this photoset: [one] [two] [three] [four] [five] [six] [seven] [eight] [nine] [ten] [eleven] [twelve] [thirteen] [fourteen] [fifteen] [sixteen] [seventeen] [eighteen] [nineteen] [twenty]
[ List of all Doctor Who Behind the Scenes photosets ]

blog.name: ygrain-synaerasis
blog.title: L'Echappée Belle d' Ygraïn
blog.description:
" Elle voulait une vie d'aventures, une vie folle, une vie plus grande qu'elle.Et l'on disait tout autour d'elle : [Ygraïn] rêve". Timothée de Fombelle, Victoria rêve

Je ne sais pas dessiner, les artworks que vous verrez ici ne sont pas les miens. Mais vous trouverez toujours un lien vers une gallerie de leurs auteurs. Personnellement, je ne fais que des montages (wallpaper, digiscrap, bannière ...) à partir de captures d'écran (screencap).. Ce tumblr est ma gallerie de rêves éphémères, mon échappée belle où je viens me ressourcer, me changer les idées, trouver un support à mes rêveries grâce aux fabuleux arts de d'autres artistes. .
Pour me contacter, en cas de problème: ygrain@gmail.com

Sinon: mon blog de lecture est: https://les-lectures-d-ygrain.tumblr.com/

blog.name: larkistin
blog.title: Larkistin
blog.description:
Raúl Esparza & Broadway Masterlist Jason Isaacs & Star Trek Masterlist

Sideblog: Larklikesstuff, where I post and reblog all I fangirl about (Jason Isaacs, Doctor Who, David Tennant, Star Trek: Discovery, Raúl Esparza and many many more).

I'm Steffi, 29 and from Germany. I'm a self-taught artist and I love to make people happy with all my heart❤️. Hope you enjoy your time on my blog. I'm also on Twitter as larkistin89.

summary: David Tennant drawing Nr. 7 may be my best Doctor yet. I think I got his face quite right. Hope you enjoy this little late night...
body: David Tennant drawing Nr. 7 may be my best Doctor yet. I think I got his face quite right. Hope you enjoy this little late night drawing from me. What we don‘t do when we can‘t sleep lol.
